options.name: join
options.description: Configures an auto-role for user "joins"

options.name: create
options.description: Create a join-based autorole

options.name: role
options.description: Role to be added to users who join your server

options.name: invite
options.description: If provided, this autorole will only apply to a specific invite code

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete an existing join-based autorole rule. By default deletes the rule for "all" channels

options.name: role
options.description: Role associated with the autorole rule to be deleted

options.name: invite
options.description: Invite code associated with the autorole rule to be deleted (optional)

options.name: list
options.description: List all join-based autoroles

options.name: voice
options.description: Configure an autorole for users joining voice channels

options.name: create
options.description: Create a voice channel-based autorole

options.name: channel
options.description: If provided, this autorole will only be applied to users joining this SPECIFIC voice channel.

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete an existing voice-based autorole rule

options.name: channel
options.description: Delete the auto-role for a specific voice channel.

options.name: list
options.description: List all voice-based autorole rules.

options.name: reaction
options.description: Configure an auto-role for users reacting on a message

options.name: create
options.description: Create a reaction-based autorole

options.name: message
options.description: ID of the Discord message to add the reaction role to

options.name: emoji
options.description: The emoji to be used for the reaction role

options.name: role
options.description: The role to be added when users react with this emoji

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete an existing reaction-based autorole rule

options.name: message
options.description: The ID of the Discord message to remove reaction roles from.

options.name: emoji
options.description: The emoji of the reactionrole rule to remove, otherwise removes ALL reactionroles on this message.

options.name: list
options.description: List all reaction-based autorole rules (reactionroles).

options.name: reset
options.description: Manually reset the reaction counts for reaction roles in this channel back to 0

options.name: button
options.description: Configure auto-roles where users can press a button to receive a role.

options.name: create
options.description: Create an auto-role where users can press a button to receive a role.

options.name: style
options.description: Select to use separate buttons for each role or a drop-down list to select roles.

options.name: message
options.description: A message to be written above the auto-role buttons. Can be edited later. Use \n for new lines.

options.name: edit
options.description: Edit an existing button-based auto-role message.

options.name: id
options.description: The message ID of the button-based auto-roles to be edited.

options.name: style
options.description: Include to edit the style: separate buttons for each role or a drop-down list to select roles.

options.name: message
options.description: Include to edit the message written above the auto-role buttons. Use \n for new lines.

options.name: maxroles
options.description: For role LISTS only. Limit the roles a user can select, such as for color roles. 0=Unlimited

options.name: listroles
options.description: Set to False to disable the list of roles in the button-role message.

options.name: addrole
options.description: Add a role to an existing button-based auto-role message.

options.name: id
options.description: The message ID of the button-based auto-roles to be edited.

options.name: role
options.description: The role that users will be assigned.

options.name: info
options.description: Information about this role that will be presented to users.

options.name: emoji
options.description: An emoji that will represent this role on buttons.

options.name: name
options.description: An alternate name to use for this role on buttons/lists. Otherwise, the role name will be used.

options.name: removerole
options.description: Remove a role from an existing button-based auto-role message.

options.name: id
options.description: The message ID of the button-based auto-roles to be edited.

options.name: role
options.description: The role ID to be removed. Use /autorole button to remove a button setup entirely.

options.name: delete
options.description: DELETE a button-based auto-role message. Use /autorole button removerole to remove a single role.

options.name: id
options.description: The message ID of the button-based auto-roles to be edited.

options.name: convert
options.description: Convert existing FBK reaction-roles on a message into button-roles

options.name: message
options.description: The Discord ID of the message containing FBK reaction-roles to be converted into button-roles.

options.name: style
options.description: Include to edit the style: separate buttons for each role or a drop-down list to select roles.
